Posts.Content: jclarsen wrote: I have my final implant put in December 2011.  I got where I was healed and pain free.  Over the last two weeks or so I'm having pain where the nipple once was that is a bit sharp and sore muscle type pain on the side and deep inside the breast.  Anyone else having this issue? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone have pain in mastectomy breast months after surgery jclarsen Aerial
